attributes.action: invest time and effort in the youth of today
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i think its time for the government to invest in our young people, especially the ones from poorer families so that they can achieve something in their lives. i personally thing they should bring back youth clubs,anything that will keep them off the streets and getting into trouble. Asbo's don't work because they only go and get more. The police on the beat doesn't exist. These kids are our future and need our help to guide them properly.
